messages.content: What is ComfyUI-TextOnSegs?

ComfyUI-TextOnSegs is a custom node for ComfyUI that adds a node to write text on the range of SEGS detected by the Ultralytics Detector in the ComfyUI-Impact-Pack using the CR Draw Text from ComfyUI_Comfyroll_CustomNodes.
What are the prerequisites for using ComfyUI-TextOnSegs?
The prerequisites for using ComfyUI-TextOnSegs are the ComfyUI-Impact-Pack and ComfyUI_Comfyroll_CustomNodes extensions.
How can you add font files for use with ComfyUI-TextOnSegs?

You can add font files by placing the font files (*.ttf) in the 'ComfyUI_windows_portable/ComfyUI/custom_nodes/ComfyUI_Comfyroll_CustomNodes/fonts' folder. This is necessary for languages like Japanese to avoid character corruption.
How can you use ComfyUI-TextOnSegs to write text on faces?

To write text on faces using ComfyUI-TextOnSegs, you need to load the 'workflows/draw_text_on_face.json' file using drag and drop, change the values of the Text node and CalcMaxFontSize node in the 'Draw Text' group, and then run the workflow. If detection fails, an error will occur, but this is by design.
What files need to be downloaded and placed in specific folders to use ComfyUI-TextOnSegs to write text on boards?

To write text on boards, you need to download the 'Can't show this (meme) SDXL' model and place it in the 'ComfyUI_windows_portable/ComfyUI/models/loras' folder, and download the 'Board detector YOLO model (For Can't show this (meme) SDXL) [Adetailer Model] - v1.0' and place it in the 'ComfyUI_windows_portable/ComfyUI/models/ultralytics/bbox' folder.
How can you use ComfyUI-TextOnSegs to write text on boards?

To write text on boards using ComfyUI-TextOnSegs, after placing the necessary files in the specified folders, you need to load the 'workflows/draw_text_on_board.json' file using drag and drop, change the values of the Text node and CalcMaxFontSize node in the 'Draw Text' group, and then run the workflow. If detection fails, an error will occur, but this is by design.
What happens if the detection of faces or boards fails when using ComfyUI-TextOnSegs?
If the detection of faces or boards fails when using ComfyUI-TextOnSegs, an error will occur, but this is a designed behavior of the system.
What is ComfyUI-TextOnSegs?
ComfyUI-TextOnSegs is a custom node for ComfyUI that allows adding a node for drawing text with CR Draw Text to the area of SEGS detected by Ultralytics Detector.
What are the requirements for installing ComfyUI-TextOnSegs?
The requirements for installing ComfyUI-TextOnSegs are ComfyUI-Impact-Pack and ComfyUI_Comfyroll_CustomNodes.
How can you add font files for use with ComfyUI-TextOnSegs?
To add font files for use with ComfyUI-TextOnSegs, place the font files (*.ttf) in the 'ComfyUI_windows_portable/ComfyUI/custom_nodes/ComfyUI_Comfyroll_CustomNodes/fonts' folder.
What should you do if Japanese or other characters are garbled when using ComfyUI-TextOnSegs?

If Japanese or other characters are garbled when using ComfyUI-TextOnSegs, you need to add font files to the 'ComfyUI_windows_portable/ComfyUI/custom_nodes/ComfyUI_Comfyroll_CustomNodes/fonts' folder.
How can you draw text on a face using ComfyUI-TextOnSegs?

To draw text on a face using ComfyUI-TextOnSegs, load the 'workflows/draw_text_on_face.json' file with D&D, change the values of the Text node, CalcMaxFontSize node, etc. in the 'Draw Text' group, and execute the workflow.
What should you do if detection fails when executing a workflow in ComfyUI-TextOnSegs?
If detection fails when executing a workflow in ComfyUI-TextOnSegs, an error will occur, but this is a specification.
How can you write text on a board using ComfyUI-TextOnSegs?

To write text on a board using ComfyUI-TextOnSegs, download the 'Can't show this (meme) SDXL' model and place it in the 'ComfyUI_windows_portable/ComfyUI/models/loras' folder, download the 'Board detector YOLO model (For Can't show this (meme) SDXL) [Adetailer Model] - v1.0' and put it in the 'ComfyUI_windows_portable/ComfyUI/models/ultralytics/bbox' folder, load the 'workflows/draw_text_on_board.json' file with D&D, change the values of the Text node, CalcMaxFontSize node, etc. in the 'Draw Text' group, and execute the workflow.
